Package RestaurantSim.SimulationSystem

Class SimulationUtilities

java.lang.Object
RestaurantSim.SimulationSystem.SimulationUtilities
public final class SimulationUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
This class provides many useful methods that are often used in simulation especially methods that are somehow related to the random number generation.

  • Method Details

    • getRandomInt

      public static int getRandomInt​(int min, int max, java.util.Random randomGenerator)
      Returns a pseudo-random number between min and max, inclusive. The difference between min and max can be at most Integer.MAX_VALUE - 1.
      Parameters:
      min - Minimum value
      max - Maximum value. Must be greater than min.
      randomGenerator - Random class instance that will be used for random number generation
      Returns:
      Integer between min and max, inclusive.
      See Also:
      Random.nextInt(int)

    • getRandomInt

      Returns a pseudo-random number between min and max, inclusive. The difference between min and max can be at most Integer.MAX_VALUE - 1.
      Parameters:
      min - Minimum value
      max - Maximum value. Must be greater than min.
      Returns:
      Integer between min and max, inclusive.
      See Also:
      Random.nextInt(int)

    • getRandomInt

      public static int getRandomInt​(int max, java.util.Random randomGenerator)

      Parameters:
      max - Maximum value. Must be greater than min.
      randomGenerator - Random class instance that will be used for random number generation
      Returns:
      Integer between min and max, inclusive.
      See Also:
      Random.nextInt(int)

    • isGoingToHappen

      public static boolean isGoingToHappen​(float chanceToHappen, java.util.Random randomGenerator)
      Returns true with given possibility. Otherwise returns false. Helpful if you want to run some code based on probability of something occurring.
      Parameters:
      chanceToHappen - Chance that this function will return true
      randomGenerator - Random class instance that will be used for random number generation
      Returns:
      true or false

    • isGoingToHappen

      Parameters:
      chanceToHappen - Chance that this function will return true
      Returns:
